price: Kuma a lõkacin da aka buga misãli da ¦an Maryama, sai gã mutãnenka daga gare shi (shi misalin) sunã dãriya da izgili.
arabic: ۞ وَلَمَّا ضُرِبَ ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ مَثَلًا إِذَا قَوۡمُكَ مِنۡهُ يَصِدُّونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walammā ḍuriba ub'nu maryama mathalan idhā qawmuka min'hu yaṣiddūna
